item.description:
This has been a fan favorite for the last couple of years.  We get together at my condo club house and enjoy an evening of games and great food brought by all of you. This is a fun way to break up the long nights and to socialize with other hikers. This event will be held at Janice's condo complex clubhouse in South Windsor. We'll have a large fireplace with fire, music, tables & chairs, bathrooms, and full kitchen available.

 

Games:

Some of the games we have already: * Pictionary * Picture Picture * Worst Case Scenario * Trivial Pursuit * Scrabble * Fact or Crap * Jenga (well a knockoff version) We'd like to see someone bring these as well as anything else: * Bolderdash * Cranium * Cards (for various card games) Bring any other game you might think 4 - 6 people at least could play at the same time. Team games would be great too. Note this is an indoor game night. We are not doing horseshoes or lawn darts!

Food:

Supplied already: * Paper and glass products Please plan to bring to share any of: * Finger food * Snacks * Small entree (plan to feed 8 people!) * Drinks

Hall Rental Donation, We would appreciate donations of $5 each person to help offset the cost of the hall rental. Donations will be made at the event so be prepared with cold hard cash.

The address will be sent to those who respond "Yes" a day before the event. If you sign up last minute be sure to e-mail Janice for directions. There is always movement those last couple of days with RSVP. Limitation on RSVP's is due to parking limitations. We all hope you can attend and enjoy a warm evening with great people. Last year this was a hit with over 60 people going each time and people brought great food and drinks to share! If you RSVP "yes" and later can't go, please remember to change your RSVP so someone else can go!!

And, yes, there will be a birthday game event January 7, 2012
item.how_to_find_us: This is the club house at my condo complex

item.name: Winter Game Night Extravaganzzzzza
